mmj.pa

Class HeaderStmt

  • java.lang.Object
    • mmj.pa.ProofWorkStmt
      • mmj.pa.HeaderStmt

  • public class HeaderStmt
extends ProofWorkStmt
    HeaderStmt represents the first line of the ProofWorksheet.

      • stmtIsIncomplete

        public boolean stmtIsIncomplete()
        Description copied from class: ProofWorkStmt
        Is statement incomplete?

        -- used primarily for cursor positioning:

        -- a virtual method that checks the statement for the state of "incompleteness" of data as indicated by state variables in the specific ProofWorkStmt types.

        Specified by:
        stmtIsIncomplete in class ProofWorkStmt
        Returns:
        true if ProofWorkStmt is "incomplete" in ProofWorksheet terminology.

      • load

        public java.lang.String load(java.lang.String firstToken)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             MMIOException,
                             ProofAsstException
        load Header statement with Tokenizer input

        Output/Updates - accum tokens and whitespace into stmtText, checking for extra tokens or premature EOF - throw exception if structural error found. - set status to 0 if no errors - return nextToken after trailing whitespace. the start of the next statement. - keep track of lineCnt, number of lines in the statement. - position cursor to field in error, as needed. - Load Header statement fields.

        Overrides:
        load in class ProofWorkStmt
        Parameters:
        firstToken - first token of statement
        Returns:
        first token of following statement.
        Throws:
        ProofAsstException - if validation error.
        java.io.IOException - if IO error
        MMIOException - if an error occurred
